name: button
description: A versatile button component with multiple variants (primary, secondary, danger, ghost, link) and sizes (small, medium, large). Supports icons, full-width mode, and disabled state.
example:
btn := components.NewButton("Save Changes")
btn.Variant = components.ButtonPrimary
btn.Size = components.ButtonSizeMedium
btn.Icon = "üíæ"
output := btn.Render()

name: card
description: A container component for grouping related content with title, content, and optional footer sections. Supports elevation (shadow) for depth and bordered style.
example:
card := components.NewCard("User Profile", "John Doe\njohn@example.com")
card.Footer = "Last updated: 2 minutes ago"
card.Elevated = true
card.Bordered = true
output := card.Render()

name: badge
description: A small label component for status indicators and counts. Available in multiple variants: default, success (green), warning (yellow), error (red), and info (blue).
example:
badge := components.NewBadge("NEW")
badge.Variant = components.BadgeInfo
output := badge.Render()

name: stack
description: A layout component for organizing items vertically or horizontally with consistent spacing. Supports alignment options (start, center, end) and customizable spacing.
example:
stack := components.NewStack(components.StackVertical)
stack.Spacing = 8
stack.Add("Item 1")
stack.Add("Item 2")
stack.Add("Item 3")
output := stack.Render()
